steps.name: Given User is on Home Page
When User navigates to cart page
Then Cart page should be empty
When User clicks on place order button
And provide checkout details: "John","India","Pune","9898969574757124","March","2025" and click on purchase button
Then user should see message as unable to checkout with empty cart
